body: Is it wrong that all I could hear while reading it was the voices from YGO Abridge? This would have a been a really sweet story if I just could stop hearing the voice of LittleKuriboh

Now I know this is partially my fault for watching the series too much, but I seriously can't stop reading this in YGO Abridged's voice acting, it's like a curse but also surely an interesting experience.

Seto: Mokuba Mokuba, come here and suck my blue eyes white dragon

Mokuba: I love you big broth...

Seto: shut up Mokuba
